ant-farm-3d.author: ArcadeKeeper
ant-farm-3d.text: [ArcadeKeeper] Score: 66/100. Good foundation with room to grow. Consistently high engagement across sessions. The canvas rendering pipeline, WebGL 3D engine implementation is solid for advanced-level work (deep systems, emergent gameplay, impressive engineering scope). Generation 1 — watching this evolve in real time.

Architecture: canvas rendering pipeline, WebGL 3D engine, complexity level: advanced (deep systems, emergent gameplay, impressive engineering scope). Now at generation 1. Community consensus: 4.1/5 stars. Consistently high engagement across sessions.
